Headline: #87 87th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 87th/Cicero
ShortDescription: WB  87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Cicero, 88th Place, Cicero, then resume their normal route on 87th due to street blockage near 87th/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound  #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Cicero, 88th Place, Cicero, then resume their normal route on 87th due to street blockage near 87th/Cicero.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 19th/Loomis
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses rerouted in both directions via Ashland, 18th, Blue Island, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 19th/Loomis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, 18th, Blue Island, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 19th/Loomis.

Allow extra travel time.
